lev.gui

Class LHelpComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.awt.Component
      • java.awt.Container
        • lev.gui.LComponent
          • lev.gui.LHelpComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LButton, LList, LMenuItem, LUserSetting

    public abstract class LHelpComponent
extends LComponent
    A GUI component that updates a help panel with text.
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
